short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With CheerCube Tab, quickly access favorite sites and a wide range of CheerCube ecards for any occasion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing CheerCube Tab, a fantastic new tab extension designed to transform your browsing experience into a personalized and delightful journey. With this extension, you can customize your new tab page with our smart search engine.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "CheerCube" tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to CheerCube Search provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://cheercube.info/?pg=3 and Privacy Policy at https://cheercube.info/?pg=2
